x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invoppggim.o | |- O = ( oppG ` G ) |
| 2 |  | invoppggim.i | |- I = ( invg ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_oppgbas | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` O ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` O ) = ( +g ` O ) |
| 7 |  | #P_id | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_oppggrp | |- ( G e. Grp -> O e. Grp ) |
| 9 | 3, 2 | #P_grpinvf | |- ( G e. Grp -> I : ( Base ` G ) --> ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 5, 2 | #P_grpinvadd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ x e. ( Base ` G ) /\ y e. ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( I ` ( x ( +g ` G ) y ) ) = ( ( I ` y ) ( +g ` G ) ( I ` x ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3expb | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( x e. ( Base ` G ) /\ y e. ( Base ` G ) ) ) -> ( I ` ( x ( +g ` G ) y ) ) = ( ( I ` y ) ( +g ` G ) ( I ` x ) ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 1, 6 | #P_oppgplus | |- ( ( I ` x ) ( +g ` O ) ( I ` y ) ) = ( ( I ` y ) ( +g ` G ) ( I ` x ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( x e. ( Base ` G ) /\ y e. ( Base ` G ) ) ) -> ( I ` ( x ( +g ` G ) y ) ) = ( ( I ` x ) ( +g ` O ) ( I ` y ) ) ) |
| 14 | 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 13 | #P_isghmd | |- ( G e. Grp -> I e. ( G GrpHom O ) ) |
| 15 | 3, 2, 7 | #P_grpinvf1o | |- ( G e. Grp -> I : ( Base ` G ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 16 | 3, 4 | #P_isgim | |- ( I e. ( G GrpIso O ) <-> ( I e. ( G GrpHom O ) /\ I : ( Base ` G ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` G ) ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 15, 16 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( G e. Grp -> I e. ( G GrpIso O ) ) |
